short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bing doesn't have it, Go to Google!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you want to use Bing as your default search engine but sometimes you just need to Google it, just click the extension and your Bing query will be converted to a Google query.
